patterns: How do I make Ga Kho Gung?
What is the recipe for Ga Kho Gung?
Can you tell me how to cook Ga Kho Gung?
responses: To make Ga Kho Gung, marinate chicken with fish sauce, sugar, and black pepper. Saute garlic, shallots, and ginger, then add chicken and cook until golden brown. Add water and simmer until the sauce thickens.

patterns: How do I make Trung Chien Ca Chua?
What is the recipe for Trung Chien Ca Chua?
Can you tell me how to cook Trung Chien Ca Chua?
responses: To make Trung Chien Ca Chua, beat eggs with fish sauce and black pepper. Saute garlic and shallots, add tomatoes, and cook until soft. Pour in the eggs and cook until set.

patterns: How do I make Dua Muoi?
What is the recipe for Dua Muoi?
Can you tell me how to prepare Dua Muoi?
responses: To make Dua Muoi, slice cabbage and carrots, then mix with salt and let sit for 30 minutes. Rinse, then mix with sugar, vinegar, garlic, and chili. Store in a jar and let ferment for a day before serving.

patterns: How do I make Canh Chua Ca?
What is the recipe for Canh Chua Ca?
Can you tell me how to cook Canh Chua Ca?
responses: To make Canh Chua Ca, boil fish with tamarind, pineapple, and tomatoes. Add fish sauce, garlic, okra, and bean sprouts. Simmer until fish is cooked and serve hot.

patterns: How do I make Rau Muong Xao Toi?
What is the recipe for Rau Muong Xao Toi?
Can you tell me how to cook Rau Muong Xao Toi?
responses: To make Rau Muong Xao Toi, blanch water spinach briefly, then stir-fry with garlic, fish sauce, salt, and sugar. Cook quickly on high heat and serve immediately.

patterns: How do I make Thit Lon Xao Chua Ngot?
What is the recipe for Thit Lon Xao Chua Ngot?
Can you tell me how to cook Thit Lon Xao Chua Ngot?
responses: To make Thit Lon Xao Chua Ngot, stir-fry pork with garlic, then add pineapple, bell peppers, fish sauce, sugar, and vinegar. Thicken with cornstarch and serve hot.

patterns: How do I make Long Heo Luoc?
What is the recipe for Long Heo Luoc?
Can you tell me how to cook Long Heo Luoc?
responses: To make Long Heo Luoc, clean and boil pork intestines, liver, and stomach with salt, ginger, and garlic. Slice and serve with fish sauce.

patterns: How do I make Gio Heo Ham Mang?
What is the recipe for Gio Heo Ham Mang?
Can you tell me how to cook Gio Heo Ham Mang?
responses: To make Gio Heo Ham Mang, simmer pork trotters with bamboo shoots, garlic, ginger, and fish sauce until tender.

patterns: How do I make Thit Heo Quay?
What is the recipe for Thit Heo Quay?
Can you tell me how to cook Thit Heo Quay?
responses: To make Thit Heo Quay, marinate pork belly with salt, five-spice powder, and garlic. Roast until the skin is crispy, then serve sliced.

patterns: How do I make Thit Kho Tau?
What is the recipe for Thit Kho Tau?
Can you tell me how to cook Thit Kho Tau?
responses: To make Thit Kho Tau, braise pork belly with coconut water, fish sauce, sugar, garlic, shallots, and hard-boiled eggs until tender.

patterns: How do I make Goi Cuon?
What is the recipe for Goi Cuon?
Can you tell me how to prepare Goi Cuon?
responses: To make Goi Cuon, soak rice paper briefly in water, then fill with shrimp, pork, vermicelli, and herbs. Roll tightly and serve with hoisin peanut sauce.

patterns: How do I make Com Tam?
What is the recipe for Com Tam?
Can you tell me how to cook Com Tam?
responses: To make Com Tam, grill marinated pork chops, serve with broken rice, pickled vegetables, and a fried egg. Drizzle with fish sauce dressing before serving.

patterns: How do I make Banh Xeo?
What is the recipe for Banh Xeo?
Can you tell me how to cook Banh Xeo?
responses: To make Banh Xeo, mix rice flour, turmeric, and coconut milk into a batter. Cook with shrimp, pork, and bean sprouts in a hot pan until crispy. Serve with fresh herbs and dipping sauce.

patterns: How do I make Mi Quang?
What is the recipe for Mi Quang?
Can you tell me how to cook Mi Quang?
responses: To make Mi Quang, cook rice noodles and serve with turmeric-infused broth, shrimp, pork, peanuts, and fresh herbs. Garnish with sesame rice crackers.

patterns: How do I make Bo Luc Lac?
What is the recipe for Bo Luc Lac?

responses: To make Pizza Margherita, spread tomato sauce on pizza dough, add mozzarella, and bake until crispy. Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil.

patterns: How do I make Banh Chung?
What is the recipe for Banh Chuung?
responses: To make Banh Chung, soak glutinous rice, mung beans, and marinate pork. Wrap in banana leaves and boil for at least 8 hours until fully cooked.
With these ingredients, you can make soft and chewy Banh Day!

What is the recipe for Banh Day?
responses: To make Banh Day, steam and pound glutinous rice until smooth. Shape into small round cakes and serve with pork floss or savory fillings.

patterns: How do I make Banh Bot Loc?
What is the recipe for Banh Bot Loc?
responses: To make Banh Bot Loc, wrap shrimp and pork in a tapioca flour dough, steam in banana leaves, and serve with fish sauce.
With these ingredients, you can make sweet and chewy Banh Troi!

patterns: How do I make Banh Troi?
What is the recipe for Banh Troi?
responses: To make Banh Troi, wrap jaggery in glutinous rice flour dough, boil until floating, and coat with sesame seeds and coconut flakes.

patterns: How do I make Nem Chua Ran?
What is the recipe for Nem Chua Ran?
responses: To make Nem Chua Ran, coat fermented pork in flour and eggs, then deep-fry until golden brown and crispy.
With these ingredients, you can make simple and tasty Trung Chien!

patterns: How do I make Trung Chien?
What is the recipe for Trung Chien?
responses: To make Trung Chien, beat eggs with salt and pepper, then fry in oil until golden.
With these ingredients, you can make simple and nutritious Trung Luoc!

patterns: How do I make Trung Luoc?
What is the recipe for Trung Luoc?
responses: To make Trung Luoc, place eggs in boiling water with a pinch of salt. Boil for 7-10 minutes, then cool in ice water before peeling.
With these ingredients, you can make flavorful Thit Nuong Ngu Vi!

patterns: How do I make Thit Nuong Ngu Vi?
What is the recipe for Thit Nuong Ngu Vi?
responses: To make Thit Nuong Ngu Vi, marinate pork with five-spice powder, garlic, fish sauce, and sugar. Grill until golden brown and serve with rice or vermicelli.
With these ingredients, you can make a nutritious bowl of Chao Luon!

patterns: How do I make Chao Luon?
What is the recipe for Chao Luon?
responses: To make Chao Luon, clean and cook eel with ginger. Simmer rice into a porridge, add the cooked eel, season with fish sauce, and top with scallions before serving.

patterns: How do I make Canh Kho Qua Nhoi Thit?
What is the recipe for Canh Kho Qua Nhoi Thit?
responses: To make Canh Kho Qua Nhoi Thit, stuff bitter melon with a mixture of ground pork and mushrooms, then simmer in a flavorful broth until tender.
With these ingredients, you can make a delicious Banh My Chao!

patterns: How do I make Banh My Chao?
What is the recipe for Banh My Chao?
responses: To make Banh My Chao, fry eggs, sausage, and pate in a pan with tomato sauce. Serve hot with a crispy baguette.
With these ingredients, you can make a nutritious bowl of Mat Ca Ngu Dai Duong!

patterns: How do I make Mat Ca Ngu Dai Duong?
What is the recipe for Mat Ca Ngu Dai Duong?
responses: To make Mat Ca Ngu Dai Duong, simmer tuna eye in a rich broth with ginger and herbs. Season with fish sauce and serve hot.
With these ingredients, you can make a refreshing plate of Nom Du Du!

patterns: How do I make Nom Du Du?
What is the recipe for Nom Du Du?
responses: To make Nom Du Du, shred green papaya and carrots, toss with fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar. Garnish with peanuts and dried shrimp before serving.
With these ingredients, you can make a tasty plate of Nom Bo Kho!

patterns: How do I make Nom Bo Kho?
What is the recipe for Nom Bo Kho?
responses: To make Nom Bo Kho, slice dried beef thinly, mix with shredded green papaya and fresh herbs. Toss with fish sauce, lime juice, and top with crushed peanuts.
With these ingredients, you can make a fresh and tasty Goi Ga!

patterns: How do I make Goi Ga?
What is the recipe for Goi Ga?
responses: To make Goi Ga, shred boiled chicken, mix with thinly sliced cabbage and carrots, toss with fish sauce, lime juice, and top with mint and crushed peanuts.
With these ingredients, you can make a simple and delicious Canh Ca Chua Trung!

patterns: How do I make Canh Ca Chua Trung?
What is the recipe for Canh Ca Chua Trung?
responses: To make Canh Ca Chua Trung, saute garlic and tomatoes until soft, add water and bring to a boil. Slowly pour in beaten eggs while stirring gently. Season with fish sauce and top with scallions before serving.
With these ingredients, you can make a tangy and refreshing Canh Sau!

patterns: How do I make Canh Sau?
What is the recipe for Canh Sau?
responses: To make Canh Sau, boil pork ribs until tender, add dracontomelon and tomatoes, and season with fish sauce. Simmer until flavors blend and top with scallions before serving.
With these ingredients, you can make a soft and delicious Banh Gio!

patterns: How do I make Banh Gio?
What is the recipe for Banh Gio?
responses: To make Banh Gio, prepare a smooth rice flour batter, fill with a seasoned ground pork and wood ear mushroom mixture, wrap in banana leaves, and steam until firm.
